General.Name: Halo Microelectronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Halo Microelectronics Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, and sale of analog and power management integrated circuit products worldwide. The company's products include lithium battery faster chargers, including linear, switching, and switched capacitor chargers; high power density DC-DC converter ICs, such as buck and boost converters; power switches; and DC-DC converters and controllers. It also provides AC-DC adapters, battery charging, power management, and USB interface and protection products. Its products are used in automotive, consumer electronics, IoT, and cloud computing applications. Halo Microelectronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Foshan, China.
